data.name: A Faire Reward
data.text: Instead of a minion, Triple Rewards Discover a Tier 1 Darkmoon Prize (Improves in 4 turns!).

data.name: All Bottled Up
data.text: At the start of each turn, get a 'Portal in a Bottle'.

data.name: Anomalous Bribe
data.text: After you sell a minion, give its stats to a minion in the Tavern.

data.name: Anomalous Evidence
data.text: At the start of your turn, choose from 2 new Quest Rewards.

data.name: Anomalous Twin
data.text: Start of combat: Summon a copy of your highest-Health minion.

data.name: Anomalous Wisdomball
data.text: You occasionally get helpful Refreshes! (Unlocks on Turn 6.)

data.name: Anti-Gravity Stadium
data.text: Minions in the Tavern have their Attack and Health swapped.

data.name: Audience's Choice
data.text: At the start of each turn, one player chooses a card for ALL players to get at end of turn.

data.name: Big League
data.text: Only Tavern Tiers 3, 4, 5, and 6 exist. Start with 10 extra Armor.

data.name: Blessed or Blighted
data.text: Start of Combat: Give your left-most minion Divine Shield and your right-most minion Reborn.

data.name: Blood of Sargeras
data.text: At the start of your turn, set your hero's Health to 12.

data.name: Bring Home the Bacon
data.text: Start with two upgrading Piggy Banks. Break them open to gain Gold!

data.name: Bring in the Buddies
data.text: Buddies are in the Tavern.

data.name: Continuing Education
data.text: At the start of each turn, get an Evolving Scroll. Each turn, it transforms into a Tavern spell from a higher Tier.

data.name: Cosmic Duality
data.text: At the start of the game, Discover a second Hero Power.

data.name: Curse of Aggramar
data.text: Start at 5 Health and 5 Gold. Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.

data.name: Deep Blue Sooner
data.text: At the start of your turn, get 2 temporary 'Deep Blues'. They give a minion more stats each time.

data.name: Denathrius' Anima Reserves
data.text: Quests and Rewards are in this game. All heroes are Sire Denathrius.

data.name: Double Header
data.text: The first time you buy a minion each turn, get an extra copy of it.

data.name: Echoes of Argus
data.text: Your Battlecries and Deathrattles trigger an extra time.

data.name: Eleventh Hour
data.text: The first time your hero takes fatal damage in combat, prevent it and gain 11 Gold next turn.

data.name: Elven Elite
data.text: The Tavern only offers cards of your Tier.

data.name: Emergency Landing
data.text: Twice per turn, you can remove all copies of a minion in the Tavern from your pool.

data.name: Eonar's Overgrown Arena
data.text: At the start of your turn, give minions in the Tavern +1/+1 for the rest of the game.

data.name: Everything's on Fire!
data.text: At the start of the game, take 25 damage. After another hero dies, regain 5 Health.

data.name: Factory Line
data.text: At the end of every 2 turns, get a plain copy of your left-most minion.

data.name: False Idols
data.text: You only need 2 copies of a minion to make it Golden. Instead of a Triple Reward, get a Gold Coin.

data.name: Feline Fortune
data.text: After another hero dies, Discover a minion from their warband. It keeps enchantments.

data.name: Finicky Hourglass
data.text: Start at Tavern Tier 2.

data.name: Fortitude of Khaz'goroth
data.text: At the end of your turn, set your left and right-most minions' Health to the higher of the two.

data.name: Gladiator's Spoils
data.text: After you win a combat, Discover a minion of your Tier. Otherwise, get a random one of a Tier lower.

data.name: Golden Arrow
data.text: Every 3 turns, get a 'Golden Arrow'.

data.name: Golden Friendship
data.text: Once per game, you can Goldenize and Pass a minion.

data.name: Golganneth's Tempest
data.text: Minions cost 2 Gold. You cannot Refresh the Tavern. It Refreshes itself after you buy a card.

data.name: Grapnel of the Titans
data.text: The first minion you buy each turn is free.

data.name: How to Even??
data.text: Only Tavern Tiers 2, 4, and 6 exist. Triple rewards Discover a minion of your Tier.

data.name: Incubation Mutation
data.text: Minions with no type have all minion types.

data.name: Instant Warband
data.text: Start with 3 different Tier 1 minions in hand.

data.name: Lay of the Land
data.text: The Tavern offers 1 extra Tavern spell after each Refresh

data.name: Light the Way
data.text: After you Refresh two times, gain 1 Gold next turn.

data.name: Line in the Sand
data.text: Start with Sandy in play.

data.name: Little League
data.text: Only Tavern Tiers 1, 2, 3, and 4 exist.

data.name: Magic Shop
data.text: Spell Tickets are in the Tavern! Get 3 to Discover a Tavern spell of your Tier.

data.name: Marin's Treasure Box
data.text: Trinkets are in this game. All heroes are Marin the Manager.

data.name: Match Fixing
data.text: Guess which player will win your next combat. If you're correct, get 3 Coins.

data.name: Might of Khaz'goroth
data.text: At the end of your turn, set your left and right-most minions' Attack to the higher of the two.

data.name: Mimiron's Clockwork Stadium
data.text: You cannot upgrade the Tavern with Gold. It upgrades itself every 2 turns. (2 turns left!)

data.name: Money Match
data.text: Start at 10 Gold.

data.name: Mystical Blossom
data.text: At the start of each turn, Discover a Tavern spell. (Unlocks on Turn 3.)

data.name: Nguyen's Shifting Disks
data.text: All heroes are Master Nguyen.

data.name: No Face, No Case
data.text: Every 4 turns, Get a 'Faceless Manipulator'.

data.name: No Place Like Holmes
data.text: Each turn, look at 2 minions. Guess which one your next opponent had last combat for a Coin.

data.name: Oops, All _______!
data.text: Only minions of this type and Neutrals are in the Tavern.

data.name: Overseer's Orb
data.text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Refresh it with minions of your most common type.

data.name: Packed Stands
data.text: The Tavern always has 7 cards.

data.name: Path of the Treasure-Seeker
data.text: After you Refresh 5 times, find the Golden Monkey! (5 left!)

data.name: Perfected Alchemy
data.text: Start with a 'Goldenizer'.

data.name: Planar Alignment
data.text: At the start of each turn, get a random minion of your most common type. (Unlocks on Turn 2.)

data.name: Pooled Resources
data.text: You can send your Gold to your teammate.

data.name: Prudence of Amitus
data.text: Unspent Gold carries over to your next turn. If you saved at least 5, gain 1 extra.

data.name: Reckless Enhancement
data.text: Minions in the Tavern each randomly gain Taunt, Windfury, Divine Shield, or Reborn.

data.name: Rising Current
data.text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Discover a Tier 1 spell. (Improves every 2 turns!)

data.name: Scout's Honor
data.text: Start with a Patient Scout in play.

data.name: Secrets of Norgannon
data.text: Tavern Tier 7 exists. Start with 10 extra Armor.

data.name: Shackles of the Primus
data.text: After each combat, remove your warband. At the start of your turn, triple your Gold.

data.name: Sin'dorei Mirror
data.text: After you buy your first Tavern spell each turn, get an extra copy of it. (Unlocks on Turn 5.)

data.name: Summoning of Champions
data.text: At the start of the game, all players Discover a Tier 6 minion from the same choices.

data.name: Tavern Special
data.text: All minions types are in the Tavern. It always has 7 cards.

data.name: Temperance of Aman'Thul
data.text: Start of Tavern Tier 3 with 9 Gold. All cards in the first shop are Tier 3.

data.name: The Golden Arena
data.text: ALL minions are Golden, but you do not get Triple Rewards.

data.name: The Keys to Victory
data.text: After you play a minion, give your other minions +1/+1 for each Keyword they share with it.

data.name: The Yogg-iseum
data.text: At the start of each turn, spin the SAME Wheel of Yogg-Saron.

data.name: Treasure Hoard
data.text: On Turn 6, Discover a Golden Tier 4 minion. (5 turns left!)

data.name: Uncompensated Upset
data.text: Start at 1 Gold. Minions cost (1) but sell for (0). Upgrading the Tavern costs (2) less.

data.name: Up-Prizing
data.text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Discover a Tier 1 Darkmoon Prize. (Improves in 3 turns!)

data.name: Valuation Inflation
data.text: Tavern Tier 1 does not exist. Minions cost gold equal to their Tavern Tier.

data.name: What Are the Odds?
data.text: Only Tavern Tiers 1, 3, and 5 exist. Triple rewards Discover a minion of your Tier.

data.name: Wisdom of Ulduar
data.text: At the end of every 3 turns, set your right-most minion's stats to 15/15. (3 turns left!)
